statements: DELETE FROM customer_feedback_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_feedback_interactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND customer_id = 200;
DELETE FROM CustomerFeedbackInteractions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM CustomerFeedbackInteractions WHERE interaction_type='Call' AND interaction_date='2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM CustomerFeedbackInteractions WHERE interaction_score > 8 AND customer_id=101;
DELETE FROM CustomerFeedbackInteractions WHERE id = 1 AND feedback = 'Negative';
DELETE FROM CustomerFeedbackSentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND sentiment_category = 'positive';
